00029 #include <sstream>
00030 #include <cassert>
00031 
00032 #include "AbstractOdeSystem.hpp"
00033 #include "Exception.hpp"
00034 
00035 AbstractOdeSystem::AbstractOdeSystem(unsigned numberOfStateVariables)
00036     : AbstractParameterisedSystem<std::vector<double> >(numberOfStateVariables),
00037       mUseAnalyticJacobian(false)
00038 {
00039 }
00040 
00041 AbstractOdeSystem::~AbstractOdeSystem()
00042 {
00043 }
00044 
00045 bool AbstractOdeSystem::CalculateStoppingEvent(double time, const std::vector<double>& rY)
00046 {
00047     return false;
00048 }
00049 
00050 std::string AbstractOdeSystem::DumpState(const std::string& rMessage,
00051                                          std::vector<double> Y)
00052 {
00053     std::stringstream res;
00054     res << rMessage << "\nState:\n";
00055     if (Y.empty())
00056     {
00057         Y = rGetStateVariables();
00058     }
00059     const std::vector<std::string>& r_var_names = rGetStateVariableNames();
00060     assert(Y.size() == r_var_names.size());
00061     for (unsigned i=0; i<r_var_names.size(); i++)
00062     {
00063         res << "\t" << r_var_names[i] << ":" << Y[i] << "\n";
00064     }
00065     return res.str();
00066 }
00067 
00068 void AbstractOdeSystem::SetDefaultInitialConditions(const std::vector<double>& rInitialConditions)
00069 {
00070     if (rInitialConditions.size() != mNumberOfStateVariables)
00071     {
00072         EXCEPTION("The number of initial conditions must be that of the number of state variables.");
00073     }
00074     assert(mpSystemInfo);
00075     mpSystemInfo->SetDefaultInitialConditions(rInitialConditions);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void AbstractOdeSystem::SetDefaultInitialCondition(unsigned index, double initialCondition)
00079 {
00080     if (index >= mNumberOfStateVariables)
00081     {
00082         EXCEPTION("Index is greater than the number of state variables.");
00083     }
00084     assert(mpSystemInfo);
00085     mpSystemInfo->SetDefaultInitialCondition(index, initialCondition);
00086 }
00087 
00088 std::vector<double> AbstractOdeSystem::GetInitialConditions() const
00089 {
00090     assert(mpSystemInfo);
00091     return mpSystemInfo->GetInitialConditions();
00092 }
00093 
00094 void AbstractOdeSystem::SetStateVariables(const std::vector<double>& rStateVariables)
00095 {
00096     if ( mNumberOfStateVariables != rStateVariables.size() )
00097     {
00098         EXCEPTION("The size of the passed in vector must be that of the number of state variables.");
00099     }
00100     mStateVariables = rStateVariables;
00101 }
00102 
00103 double AbstractOdeSystem::CalculateRootFunction(double time, const std::vector<double>& rY)
00104 {
00105     bool stop = CalculateStoppingEvent(time, rY);
00106     return stop ? 0.0 : 1.0;
00107 }
00108 
00109 bool AbstractOdeSystem::GetUseAnalyticJacobian()
00110 {
00111     return mUseAnalyticJacobian;
00112 }
00113 
00114 const std::vector<double>& AbstractOdeSystem::rGetConstStateVariables() const
00115 {
00116     return mStateVariables;
00117 }
